title: The Secret Life of Walter Parker: Tutor by Day, Hero by Night
summary: Walter Parker, a 40-year-old tutor, discovers his superpowers and battles evil, all while maintaining his day job.
summaryGerman: Walter Parker, ein 40-jähriger Tutor, entdeckt seine Superkräfte und bekämpft das Böse, während er seinen Tagesjob beibehält.
summaryDutch: Walter Parker, een 40-jarige tutor, ontdekt zijn superkrachten en bestrijdt het kwaad, terwijl hij zijn dagbaan behoudt.
summaryFrench: Walter Parker, un tuteur de 40 ans, découvre ses super-pouvoirs et combat le mal, tout en maintenant son emploi de jour.

story.text: Walter Parker starts his week like any other, tutoring statistics. Unknown to him, a meteorite nearby grants him telekinetic powers.
Feeling a strange new energy, Walter aids a student in crisis, subtly using his new powers to guide her to the solution.
While tutoring, Walter overhears a crime happening outside. He sneaks out and stops the criminals, feeling the thrill of his secret dual life.
Walter balances his time between helping students and secretly training to control his powers, finding peace in his doubled life.
A major threat looms over the city. Walter, under the guise of 'The Scholar', devises a plan to save the town with his intellect and powers combined.
The city cheers as 'The Scholar' averts disaster. Walter feels a deep connection with his community, enjoying a quiet evening at home.
Reflecting on his week, Walter realizes the value of his everyday role as a tutor and his extraordinary contributions as a hero.

ending: Back in his quiet tutoring office, Walter Parker smiles, knowing his secret makes every lesson a little more extraordinary.
moral: Every person has a hidden hero within; sometimes, it just needs a little spark to come alive.
